data.actual_result: Mini box stays visible and there is no animation of closing it when the main profile is closed, it just dissapears.
data.expected_result: The mini, blue box should close as the main profile expands, as it did before the new channel update.
data.short_description: When loading a user profile from a voice channel, mini (non-expanded) profile stays visible until the main profile window is closed.
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel - Select a user in the voice channel and hit 'View Profile'
